nodes.text: The Freeman Memorial was a memorial set up inside the Adventurers' Guildhall at the Township of Aurilia on Dathomir. It consisted of a Yanjon statue which commemorated someone who went by the alias, Freeman.

This memorial was placed in the MMORPG Star Wars Galaxies, to honor the former Lead Gameplay Designer Jeff Freeman. Jeff Freeman tragically took his life in 2008, and this memorial was placed by the game developers in his memory.
